column5: Stay at our contemporary guesthouse studio. It features a designer kitchen with black appliances and glass tile back-splash. The bathroom features a walk-in shower with travertine, designer glass tile and glass shower door. The studio also comes with stack-able washer and dryer. Great Ft. Worth location, 10 minute drive to TCU, Downtown, West 7th, and the Stockyards & less that $10 Uber ride. Free wifi and DirecTV!
column8: Modern Studio Downtown, w7, TCU & Stockyards
